definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Bruce Wasserstein graduated from both Harvard Law School and Harvard Business School.
sentences.chinese: 沃瑟斯坦是哈佛法学院和哈佛商学院的双料高才生。

sentences.english: He is one of the top students in Shenyang .
sentences.chinese: 他是沈阳的高才生之一。

sentences.english: The teacher, along with a committee of bright students has compiled a reading list.
sentences.chinese: 那位教师和一批高才生已经编写了一份读书目录。

definition: to pass entrance exam/to enter college after a competitive exam
to gain entry by passing an exam/to be admitted to (a college etc)
to pass a university entrance exam
science and engineering as academic subjects
excelling both in morals and studies (idiom); top marks for studies and for behavior (at school)/a paragon of virtue and learning
